skills.name: Mark of the Storm
skills.blurb: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy. The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kennen's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Mark of the Storm'' to affected enemies for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing upon applying the second stack. Upon applying 3 stacks to a target, the stacks are consumed to {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds and restore {{sti|{{as|25 energy}}}}.
If the {{tip|stun}} is applied to a target more than once within 6 seconds, its duration is reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kennen's champion ability apply a stack of Mark of the Storm to affected enemies for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing upon applying the second stack. Upon applying 3 stacks to a target, the stacks are consumed to stun them for 1.25 seconds and restore 25 energy.
If the stun is applied to a target more than once within 6 seconds, its duration is reduced to 0.5 seconds.
skills.notes: * '''Kennen''' will still restore energy if the target dies from a third stack of ''Mark of the Storm''.

skills.name: Thundering Shuriken
skills.blurb: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' throws a charged shuriken in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Kennen throws a charged shuriken in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
skills.notes: * ''Thundering Shuriken'' will fire from wherever '''Kennen''' was at the start of the cast time.

skills.name: Electrical Surge
skills.blurb: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} [[Basic attacks]] grant a stack of ''Electrical Surge'' {{tip|on-attack}}, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, '''Kennen's''' next basic attack on-hit consumes all ''Electrical Surge'' stacks to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and apply a stack of {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}} to the target.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' sends out a surge of electricity to all nearby enemies afflicted by {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}} or caught in {{ai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}.
''A nearby enemy with {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}} or within {{ai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}} is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be affected.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Basic attacks grant a stack of Electrical Surge on-attack, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, Kennen's next basic attack on-hit consumes all Electrical Surge stacks to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Kennen's Mark of the Storm to the target.
Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity to all nearby enemies afflicted by Kennen's Mark of the Storm or caught in Kennen's Slicing Maelstrom, dealing them magic damage.
A nearby enemy with Kennen's Mark of the Storm or within Kennen's Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be affected.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60 to 100}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* The empowered basic attack applies {{tip|spell damage}}, while the electrical surge deals {{tip|area damage}}.
* ''Electrical Surge's'' enhanced attack does not apply to [[structures]] nor will it be consumed against them.
* ''Electrical Surge's'' enhanced attack will be consumed and the bonus damage will not be applied if '''Kennen''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
** ''Electrical Surge's'' enhanced attack cannot be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} or {{tip|block|blocked}}.

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)

skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.blurb: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' transforms into a ball of electricity, becoming unable to declare basic attacks but becoming {{tip|ghosted}} and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. ''Lightning Rush'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds for its duration, and does so automatically after its duration.
While transformed, '''Kennen''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores {{sti|{{as|40 energy}}}} if he damages at least one enemy.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Kennen''' ends ''Lightning Rush'' and gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds.
''Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kennen transforms into a ball of electricity, becoming unable to declare basic attacks but becoming ghosted and gaining 100% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Lightning Rush can be recast after 0.5 seconds for its duration, and does so automatically after its duration.
While transformed, Kennen deals magic damage to all enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores 40 energy if he damages at least one enemy.
Recast: Kennen ends Lightning Rush and gains bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|80/2 to 240/2}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Lightning Rush'' will only damage any particular enemy once per cast.
* ''Lightning Rush'' can grant '''Kennen''' an effective 230 bonus movement speed (assuming there are no modifiers involved).
* '''Kennen's''' {{stil|attack range}} is reduced{{ft|by 575|to -25}}during ''Lightning Rush'', further reduced to -{{fd|33.75}} with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other sources of movement speed boosts.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
  • Non-Champion Damage: (+ 40% AP)

skills.name: Slicing Maelstrom
skills.blurb: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' summons ''Shuriken Storm'', a magical storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and striking bolts of lightning down on all nearby enemies every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, each bolt dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
Each maelstrom hit applies a {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}}, up to a maximum of 3 per unit.
''Slicing Maelstrom'' deals 10% increased damage with each successive strike against a target, up to a maximum of 150% damage with one strike.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kennen summons Shuriken Storm, a magical storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and striking bolts of lightning down on all nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds, each bolt dealing magic damage.
Each maelstrom hit applies a Kennen's Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3 per unit.
Slicing Maelstrom deals 10% increased damage with each successive strike against a target, up to a maximum of 150% damage with one strike.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Resistances|{{ap|20 to 60}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage Per Bolt|{{ap|40|75|110}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Resistances:
  • Magic Damage Per Bolt: (+ 20% AP)
• Total Single-Target Damage: (+ 150% AP)
